metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010091 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: tinymce 4.7.11, 4.7.12 is affected by: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization ofInput During Web Page Generation. The impact is: JavaScript code execution.The component is: Media element. The attack vector is: The victim mustpaste malicious content to media element's embed tab.

criterions.comment: tinymce package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
